title: Poetica
description: Explore this sinfully, delicious collection of passionate prose and poems that will stir your appetite for the sensual and awaken a taste for the erotic and exotic. As one reader said, "Let S.J's words transport you to a world of erotic sensuality so enthralling, you will be unwilling to leave".This collection contains adult themes and therefore NOT intended for minors.
author: S.J. Warner
